Articles.Content:
..the main page had me downloading 0.24 from .. multiplay.co.uk?

That's an odd choice for Canada... >.>
me too. But I can't wait until i play it!

Multiplay uses a Content Delivery Network. When the servers are under very high load, you'll be getting content (in this case, KSP) from whatever servers can take the request, instead of the usual (servers that are close to your location).
